title: Strava
body: Strava is a popular mobile app that tracks hikes, runs, rides and swims and is available on iOS and Android.

title: Suunto
body: A watch that’s very popular with trail runners. Hard-wearing and durability are some of its qualities.

title: Fitbit
body: An entire family of products that has something for fitness beginners, pro athletes, and everyone in between.
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker, Mindfulness Tracker

title: Google Fit app
body: Google Fit is a fitness tracking app available for Android and iOS devices. It will sync data from other tracker apps like hydration, sleep and mindfulness.
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker, Mindfulness Tracker

title: Garmin
body: Popular activity tracking watch with many different models ranging from basic through to pro athlete.
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker

title: Polar
body: Popular activity tracking watch like Garmin and Suunto which tracks many different activity types.

title: MyFitnessPal
body: Calorie counting app that also supports activity, hydration and sleep tracking.
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker

title: Oak Meditation
body: Guided meditation and breathing exercises. Learn mindful and loving-kindness meditation today.

title: Oura
body: The most accurate sleep tracker wearable that we have tested. Highly recommended for detailed sleep analysis.

title: Seven
body: The 7 Minute Workout App is a brilliant workout app with different levels of effort ideal for quick HIIT activities.

title: My Water
body: 8 glasses of water a day is the basis of good nutrition and My Water app will help you track your water intake throughout the day.

title: Deel
body: Hire the best talent in 150 countries in minutes, without worrying about compliance, payroll or HR admin.

title: First Base
body: Firstbase helps businesses set up, manage, maintain and retrieve all the physical equipment their remote workers need.

title: Flok
body: End-to-end company retreat planning to help you get your teams together outside of work.

title: Seed Legals
body: SeedLegals automates the legal’s you need to grow your business, with unlimited support along the way.

title: Saftey Wing
body: Make sure your remote teams have the right insurance with Saftey Wing

title: Active Things
body: Active Things is your Active Travel Assistant, helping you find and access (secure) bike parking, routes and more.

title: Lift Share
body: Join 700,000 like-minded people saving money and the planet by car sharing with Lift Share who offer a business version

title: Ecologi
body: We plant trees and fund the world’s best climate crisis solutions and have a business version to help get your workforce carbon neutral

title: RunKeeper
body: All the tools you need to become a stronger runner. Insights, workouts, and trainer guidance will get you to your goals.

title: Apple Health
body: Will sunc with all trackers so connecting this to Fitlink is recommended and by default this will be on your iPhone already.
category: Activity Tracker, Water Tracker, Sleep Tracker, Mindfulness Tracker

title: Nike Run Club
body: The Nike Run Club gives you the guidance, inspiration and innovation you need to become a better athlete.

title: Runtastic
body: Record your workouts and review your statistics with the Runtasitic app by Adidas.

title: Go Jauntly
body: A walking app for everyday outdoor adventures. Discover greener walks, connect with nature and enjoy outdoor adventures with friends.

title: Lupa
body: The world’s smartest running partner that guides you through your run.
